metadata.title: CVE-2019-6992 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A stored-self XSS exists in web/skins/classic/views/controlcaps.php of ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code in a vulnerable field via a long NAME or PROTOCOL to the index.php?view=controlcaps URI.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-6992` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.32.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.32.3-2').
